A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a thrilling ride from beginning to end! By far my favorite of the recent movies. If you're still deciding if you want to see it\, I implore you to ignore the butt hurt comments of disappointed fanboys. They had incorrect assumptions about the way the story would go\, and they paid for it. It was fantastically done\, and extremely entertaining. Rian Johnson has left large shoes to fill!
